body:
Using `spack@develop` (3-Aug, 4c97a0ea1cbcb42fff4cb2183552b6b6c441d791) on NERSC Cori (`cray-cnl7-haswell`) with `%intel@19.1.2.254`:

The full build logs, and the exact concretized spec of `m4` used here, are attached below.

Full build log: [m4-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5023549/m4-build-out.txt)
Spec: [m4.spec.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5023556/m4.spec.yaml.txt)

```
$> spack install -f ./m4.spec.yaml
...
==> Installing m4
==> m4: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> m4: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> m4: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'

20 errors found in build log:
     610                     from /tmp/eugeneswalker/spack-stage/spack-stage-m4-1.4.18-bbichdfmtakuzmxzpf5uzjpb452cap7u/spack-src/lib/c-strcasecmp.c(22):
     611    /usr/include/features.h(378): warning #1224: #warning directive: _FORTIFY_SOURCE requires GCC 4.1 or later
     612      #  warning _FORTIFY_SOURCE requires GCC 4.1 or later

     618            ^

     621        if (UCHAR_MAX <= INT_MAX)
     622                         ^
     623

     625    make[3]: *** [Makefile:1910: c-strcasecmp.o] Error 2

     ...

  >> 762    /tmp/eugeneswalker/spack-stage/spack-stage-m4-1.4.18-bbichdfmtakuzmxzpf5uzjpb452cap7u/spack-src/lib/malloca.h(111): error: function call is not allowed in a constant express
```

@certik @scottwittenburg @shahzebsiddiqui @frankwillmore @mpbelhorn
title: Installation issue: m4 on NERSC Cori using Intel Compiler
